https://openminds.om-i.org/props/accessi._instruction: Add the accessibility of the data for this research product version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/accessi.description: Level to which something is accessible to someone or something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/accessi.label: Accessibility
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/accessi.name: accessibility

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/copyrig._instruction: Enter the copyright information of this research product version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/copyrig.description: Exclusive and assignable legal right of an originator to reproduce, publish, sell, or distribute the matter and form of a creative work for a defined time period.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/copyrig.label: Copyright
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/copyrig.name: copyright

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/custodi._instruction: Add all parties that fulfill the role of a custodian for the research product version (e.g., a research group leader or principle investigator). Custodians are typically the main contact in case of misconduct, obtain permission from the contributors to publish personal information, and maintain the content and quality of the data, metadata, and/or code of the research product version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/custodi.description: The 'custodian' is a legal person who is responsible for the content and quality of the data, metadata, and/or code of a research product.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/custodi.label: Custodian
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/custodi.name: custodian

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip._instruction: Enter a description (or abstract) of this research product version. Note that this version specific description will overwrite the description for the overarching dataset.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.label: Description
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.name: description

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/develop._instruction: Add all parties that developed this web service version. Note that these developers will overwrite the developer list provided for the overarching web service.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/develop.description: Legal person that creates or improves products or services (e.g., software, applications, etc.).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/develop.label: Developer
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/develop.name: developer

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullDoc._instruction: Add the publication or file that acts as the full documentation of this research product version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullDoc.description: Non-abridged instructions, comments, and information for using a particular product.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullDoc.label: Full documentation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullDoc.name: fullDocumentation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullNam._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name (or title) for this research product version. Note that this version specific full name will overwrite the full name for the overarching dataset.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullNam.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullNam.label: Full name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullNam.name: fullName

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/funding._instruction: Add all funding information of this research product version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/funding.description: Money provided by a legal person for a particular purpose.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/funding.label: Funding
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/funding.name: funding

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPart._instruction: Add all software versions that are components of this web service version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPart.label: Has part
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPart.name: hasPart

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/homepag._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this research product version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/homepag.description: Main website of something or someone.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/homepag.label: Homepage
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/homepag.name: homepage

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/howToCi._instruction: Enter the preferred citation text for this research product version. Leave blank if citation text can be extracted from the assigned digital identifier.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/howToCi.description: Preferred format for citing a particular object or legal person.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/howToCi.label: How to cite
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/howToCi.name: howToCite

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inputFo._instruction: Add all content types that can be used as input by this web service version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inputFo.description: Format of data that is put into a process or machine.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inputFo.label: Input format
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inputFo.name: inputFormat

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPrece._instruction: Add the web service version preceding this web service version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPrece.label: Is preceded by
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPrece.name: isPrecededBy

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isVaria._instruction: Add all web service versions that can be used alternatively to this web service version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isVaria.label: Is variant of
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isVaria.name: isVariantOf

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isVersi._instruction: Add the version-independent information about this web service.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isVersi.label: Is version of
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isVersi.name: isVersionOf

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/keyword._instruction: Add all relevant keywords to this research product version either by adding controlled terms or by suggesting new terms.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/keyword.description: Significant word or concept that are representative of something or someone.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/keyword.label: Keyword
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/keyword.name: keyword

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/otherCo._instruction: Add any other contributions to this research product version that are not covered under 'author'/'developer' or 'custodian'.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/otherCo.description: Giving or supplying of something (such as money or time) as a part or share other than what is covered elsewhere.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/otherCo.label: Other contribution
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/otherCo.name: otherContribution

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/outputF._instruction: Add all content types that can be generated as output by this web service version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/outputF.description: Format of data that comes out of, is delivered or produced by a process or machine.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/outputF.label: Output format
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/outputF.name: outputFormat

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related._instruction: Add all further publications besides the full documentation that provide the original context for the production of this research product version (e.g., an original research article that used or produced the data of this research product version).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related.description: Reference to something that was made available for the general public to see or buy.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related.label: Related publication
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related.name: relatedPublication

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/release._instruction: Enter the date (actual or intended) on which this research product version was first release, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/release.description: Fixed date on which a product is due to become or was made available for the general public to see or buy
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/release.label: Release date
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/release.name: releaseDate

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/reposit._instruction: Add the file repository of this research product version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/reposit.description: Place, room, or container where something is deposited or stored.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/reposit.label: Repository
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/reposit.name: repository

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/shortNa._instruction: Enter a short name (or alias) for this research product version that could be used as a shortened display title (e.g., for web services with too little space to display the full name).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/shortNa.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/shortNa.label: Short name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/shortNa.name: shortName

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/support._instruction: Enter all channels through which a user can receive support for handling this research product version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/support.description: Way of communication used to interact with users or customers.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/support.label: Support channel
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/support.name: supportChannel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usageCo._instruction: Add all licenses and available data usage agreements applicable to this product version. Inherited by all product versions unless overridden at the version level.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usageCo.label: Usage condition
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usageCo.name: usageCondition

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this research product version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.label: Version identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.name: versionIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version._instruction: Enter a short description (or summary) of the novelties/peculiarities of this research product version in comparison to its preceding versions. If this research product version is the first version, you can enter the following disclaimer 'This is the first version of this research product'.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.label: Version innovation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/version.name: versionInnovation
